title: Australian diary. No. 097
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: a versatile woman runs a farm by herself; blindness poses no impediment to a group of children’s happiness and ship provisioning is a skilled and intricate job.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
